content: chart or wrong side is facing you written instructions row 2-4 repeat row row 4 ws ds p 11 11 13 turn 1-4 until 2 1 inches/ 5 3 cm from desired row 5 rs ds knit to ds k the ds and 1 st final length of foot mark row you have after it turn stopped on your chart row 6 ws ds purl to ds p the ds and 1 tip stand on a piece of paper mark length of foot st after it turn from tips of toes to end of heel mark 2 1 inches/5 3 cm from end of heel use this to help gauge when to start short row heel 3 repeat row 5 and 6 until you are on the right side row 5 and the last st is ds knit ds place bor marker leg of sock work row 1 of chart or written instructions 14 16 18 times until bor knit as established continuing chart or written instructions row 2-4 repeat row 1-4 until you are 1 inch / 2 5 cm from the desired length of leg work k1 p1 ribbing for 1 inch/ 2 5 cm bind off using tubular bind off or jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off finishing weave in ends with tapestry needle soak socks in lukewarm water for 15 - 20 minutes press out water with a towel place on sock blockers or lay flat to air dry enjoy your starfall socks 4 heel turn top down pattern row 1 rs sl 1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn cuff row 2 ws sl 1 p 7 p2tog p1 turn using your preferred stretchy method co row 3 rs sl 1 knit to 1 st before gap ssk 56 64 72 join for working in the round k1 turn mark the beginning of the round with a stitch marker row 4 ws sl 1 purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn row 1 k1 p1 repeat row 3 and 4 until 18 20 22 sts repeat cuff rib row 1 for 1 inch/ 2 5 cm remain leg gusset work row 1 of chart or written instructions k 9 10 11 sts this position is the new 14 16 18 times until bor beginning of the round bor in the middle knit as established continuing chart or of the heel place a special bor marker written instructions row 2-4 repeat row setup round 1 k across the 9 10 11 1-4 until desired length of leg mark row remaining heel sts then pick up and knit you have stopped on your chart proceed to 12 14 18 sts in edge of heel flap place dividing sts for heel flap marker work the next row of chart or written heel flap instructions 7 8 9 times over 28 32 36 sts divide sts as follows work as established place marker pick up and knit 12 14 18 sts for 28 32 36 sts
